keyMoments.description: Nami discovers the skull-shaped island connection, solving the mystery of the City of Gold's location
keyMoments.significance: Major breakthrough that gives the crew their target for the gold hunting expedition

keyMoments.description: Celebrates Eve of Gold Festival with campfire party, dancing with wolves to the song 'Family'
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the crew's ability to find joy and create celebration even in dangerous situations

keyMoments.description: Makes final preparations for the gold hunting expedition to the Skull's Right Eye
keyMoments.significance: Sets up the crew's venture into the heart of Upper Yard to find Shandora

keyMoments.description: Retreats from battle after Kamakiri is injured protecting Raki
keyMoments.significance: Shows the warriors' dedication to protecting each other despite their determination to fight

keyMoments.description: Warriors resolve internal conflicts and commit to reclaiming Upper Yard from Enel
keyMoments.significance: Establishes their unified determination for the final battle to reclaim their ancestral homeland after 400 years
